summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East Prospect Street from 38th Avenue North to 39th Avenue North; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15718 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
